login.welcome: Welcome to the UrbEat admin panel!

respondents.errorLoadingRespondents: Oops... There was an error when loading respondents. Try again later.

filters.hasNotSentAtLeastNumberOfSensorsData: Have sent less than this much sensor data

changePassword.saveConfirmationDialogInformation: Are you sure you want to save the new password?
changePassword.passwordMinLenError: Password must be at least {{minLen}} characters long.

createImageOptions.codeTooltip: The image label is required in order to export survey results. It will not be displayed to the respondents.

createQuestion.contentLenError: Field cannot be longer than 250 characters

createSection.nameLenError: Field cannot be longer than 100 characters
createSection.displayOnOneScreenTooltip: If checked, all questions in this section will be displayed on one page in the application.

createSurvey.nameLenError: Field cannot be longer than 100 characters
createSurvey.sectionsNumError: Survey must contain at least one section

createTextSelectionOptions.showSectionTooltip: WARNING! In this section, only the options with visibility set to "Answer triggered" are available for selection.

option.lenError: Option cannot be longer than {{maxLen}} characters

createSurveySendingPolicy.timeRangesDescription: Add time ranges, when the survey should be available to submit. The selected time ranges will be applied to all selected dates.
createSurveySendingPolicy.overlapWithExisting: Date ranges overlap with already existing time ranges.

surveySendingPolicy.couldNotLoadSendingPolicies: Could not load survey sending policies
surveySendingPolicy.selectTimeSlotsToDeleteFirst: Please select at least one time slot from the calendar that you want to delete first
surveySendingPolicy.deletingConfirmationText: Are you sure you want to delete the selected time slots?
surveySendingPolicy.couldNotDeleteSendingPolicies: Failed to delete the survey sending policy

surveyDetails.surveyNotPublished: The survey has not been published yet
surveyDetails.errorOnDeletingSurvey: An error occurred while deleting the survey.
surveyDetails.errorOnPublishingSurvey: An error occurred while publishing the survey.
surveyDetails.publishInformationText: Are you sure you want to publish the survey? You will no longer be able to edit it.
surveyDetails.deleteInformationText: Are you sure you want to delete the survey? This action cannot be undone.

resultsGrid.question: Question
resultsGrid.nothingToDisplay: No results to display. Try changing filters.
resultsGrid.loadingError: An error occured when loading the results. Please try again later.

startSurvey.description: The initial survey is a special type of survey. It is shown to respondents once, immediately after their first login to the application. It contains only multiple-choice questions, which allow you to group respondents. This way, in later surveys, you can ask questions only for specific groups of respondents. For example, you can collect information about gender and later create questions only for women/men.
startSurvey.question: Question
startSurvey.saveInformationText: If respondents have already been added to the system, they will not be automatically assigned to the appropriate groups. This will need to be done manually.
startSurvey.couldNotLoadStartSurvey: Could not load initial survey. Please try again later.
startSurvey.thereAreNoQuestions: The initial survey does not contain any questions. You can add some if you wish.
startSurvey.addingQuestionsFailed: Adding questions failed. Please try again later.
startSurvey.publishingFailed: Failed to publish the survey. Please try again later.
startSurvey.publishInformationText: Are you sure you want to publish the survey? You will not be able to edit it afterward.
startSurvey.surveyAlreadyPublished: The survey has already been published.

temperature.description: In this view, data from temperature sensors is available. If the respondents have the appropriate sensors and have synchronized them with the application, the data will be displayed in the table.
temperature.nothingToDisplay: No data to display. Try changing filters.
temperature.loadingError: An error occured when loading the data. Please try again later.

map.noData: No data, please try changing the filters.
map.somethingWentWrong: Something went wrong. Please try again later.

researchArea.title: Research Area
researchArea.description: Here you can define the area of the conducted research. This will automatically flag the location of respondents as 'outside the research area', as well as responses in the surveys as provided outside the research area.
researchArea.errorOnSavingChanges: An error occurred while saving changes. Please try again later.
researchArea.errorOnDeleting: An error occurred while deleting. Please try again later.
researchArea.errorOnLoading: An error occurred while loading the research area. Please try again later.

changeAdminPassword.title: Change Administrator Account Password
changeAdminPassword.passwordChangedSuccessfully: The password has been changed successfully.
changeAdminPassword.minPasswordLen: The password must contain at least 12 characters.
changeAdminPassword.maxPasswordLen: The password must contain no more than 64 characters.

sensorDevices.description: Here you can configure the MAC addresses of sensors, making it easier for respondents to synchronize them with the application.
sensorDevices.notValidMacAddress: This is not a valid MAC address
sensorDevices.macAlreadyExists: This MAC address is already in use
sensorDevices.repetitionDecisionRequired: Some identifiers already exist. What would you like to do with them?
sensorDevices.macsNotUnique: Some MAC addresses are not unique
sensorDevices.couldNotImport: Import failed. Please try again later.
sensorDevices.someOfTheRowsHasInvalidMacFormat: At least one row contains an invalid MAC address
sensorDevices.importTooltip: The import file must be in CSV format and contain two columns: sensorId and sensorMac.
